scenes.background: Monica stands up, arms crossed, while Bob frowns and looks at his watch.
scenes.description: 'We need to solve this now. Bob, can you handle the client call?'

options.text: I'll handle the call. Let's make sure we have all the information first.
options.analysis: You took responsibility for the call and suggested preparation, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: Monica, it's better if you do it since you have more details on this.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Monica's expertise, showing strong perception and empathy, but your willingness to take immediate action was lower.

options.text: I think we should wait until we have a clearer plan before calling.
options.analysis: You suggested delaying the call to avoid mistakes, showing good social skills but lower empathy and motivation to resolve the issue immediately.
